availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, carpenter. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth Arivett. Father of Ann E. Arivett, James Arivett, Mary C. Arivett, Charles Arivett, Victoria Arivett, and Ellen Arivett. Carpenter in Christian County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, p. 787.
"William Arivett (1816-1886)," Find A Grave, Memorial #67969608, accessed December 13, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/67969608.
